jcr:root.localscene: Watch the sunrise or set in Battery Park and run along 25 acres of green space overlooking the New York Harbor. World Trade Center memorial site complex and the offices of the World Financial Center are steps from the building. Enjoy your evenings in chic Tribeca and nightlife in the Meatpacking District half a mile away. Shopping and culture within a walking distance at the South Street Seaport, Chinatown, Little Italy and SoHo. Major subway stations provide access up to Midtown and southern ferries make New Jersey and Staten Island within reach.
jcr:root.name: 123 Washington Street
jcr:root.overview: Oakwood features luxury apartments in The Residences at W New York - Downtown overlooking the New York Harbor and Manhattan skyline. 1 World Trade Center, the New York Stock Exchange, Wall Street and Battery Park are at your doorstep. This brand new building opened in September 2010 and features 24hr. doorman/concierge, a fitness center and spa with breathtaking views, a rooftop and resident's lounge and patio, and complimentary breakfast. Enjoy your temporary apartment in style and luxury with custom designed furniture, full kitchens, washer/dryer in-suite, and flat screen TV's. Also included are all utilities, phone, cable, wireless high speed internet, and the full linen package. For your convenience and dining pleasure, access the renowned BLT Bar & Grill on site.
